evidence.text: Notice of Case Assignment to Judge Michael H. Simon and Discovery and Pretrial Scheduling Order. NOTICE: Counsel shall print and serve the summonses and all documents issued by the Clerk at the time of filing upon all named parties in accordance with Local Rule 3-5. Discovery is to be completed by 9/12/2025. Joint Alternate Dispute Resolution Report is due by 10/14/2025. Pretrial Order is due by 10/14/2025. Ordered by Judge Michael H. Simon
Signed on 8/6/2025 by Judge Michael H. Simon
